alert.note: Alert for Ascension; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Livingston; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 1:53PM CDT until September 08 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern St. Helena Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern East Feliciana Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 153 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watson, or 10 miles northeast of Denham Springs, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Brusly, White Castle, Livingston, Sorrento, French Settlement, Slaughter, Port Vincent, Westminster, Geismar, Watson, and Pride. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 150 and 183. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 29. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Livingston; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge
